name.en: State Register Agency of Legal Entities of Armenia

description.en: The State Register Agency of Legal Entities of Armenia maintains an Electronic Register where on line applications for the registration of legal entities can be made. It also has a search function that allows unregistered users to see limited details about existing companies. Full information about any company requires registration and the payment of a fee.

access.guidanceOnLocatingIds: The free, unregistered search facility provides basic information about a company or indivdual. At present search is only available in Armenian and the charters of companies registered before April 2011 are not available electronically.
